title: Still No Cure for the Common Cold
author: Keith J WinsteinStaff Reporter
cleaned_text: July 28, 2005 12:01 am ET In the latest blow to the use of alternative medicine, researchers found that echinacea, which is the most widely used herbal product in the country and is taken for the common cold, doesn't help colds at all.
